title: 12 Virtual And IRL Things To Do Around DC This Week
description: There's Restaurant Week, new exhibits at Studio Gallery, and author Jason Reynolds' new play debuting at Anacostia Playhouse at events around D.C. this week.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.
